amendment.description: An amendment numbered 239 printed in Part D of House Report 117-241 to require the United States to seek to require the Chinese Communist Party to match emission cutting targets established by the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steel amendment (A012) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 265 - 166 (Roll no. 28).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A012) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Steel amendment (A012) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 265 - 166 (Roll no. 28).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mrs. Steel.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Steel amendment (A012) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 265 - 166 (Roll no. 28).
